properties.title: To Tweens
properties.description: The most common type of animation is a to() tween because it allows you to define the destination values (and most people think in terms of animating to certain values)
notes: Performance is paramount, especially on mobile devices with sluggish processors
Silky smooth HTML5 javascript animation is the hallmark of any tweening engine worth its weight and GSAP outperforms old “industry standards” by literally 1000%+ under stress
What was jerky and twitchy is now fluid. It’s the result of countless optimizations made to ensure that your interactive projects are responsive, efficient, and buttery smooth

notes: JavaScript is the world's most popular programming language.
JavaScript is the programming language of the Web
